duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and produce spreadsheets using Excel for revenue reconciliation.
Handle daily transaction receipts and other reports from Continuing Education’s student information system.
Answer phone calls for the department and assist inquires about Continuing Education classes.
Assist with social and print media as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required. One year of clerical training or experience. Associate’s degree preferred. Basic math skills. Proficiency with computers and Microsoft Office including Excel, Word and PowerPoint.
